author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: قَدْ اصْفَرَّتِ الأَوْرَاقُ مِنْ سُمُوْمِ أَرْيَاحِ النِّفَاقِ أَيْنَ جُوْدُ سَحَابِ جُوْدِكَ يَا جَوَادَ العَالَمِينَ *
translation: The leaves are yellowed by the poisoning winds of sedition: Where is the downpour of the clouds of Thy bounty, O Giver of the worlds?
